flow.header: Follow our guide to pair your LinkedIn account with the 2FAS app.

menu.title: Please select the method you use to open LinkedIn right now

steps.content: Go to **www.linkedin.com** and log into your account.
Click your avatar in the top bar and select **'Settings & Privacy'**. From the left-hand menu, select **'Sign in & security'**.
Then select the **'Two-step verification'** section on the right. Click **'Set up'**.
You may be asked to verify your account by entering a 6-digit code sent to your email.

Select the **'Authenticator App'** and click **'Continue'**.
You may be asked to enter a password for security reasons. Enter your password and click **'Continue'**.
Use **'Add manually'** feature below to add LinkedIn to your 2FAS app and rewrite secret key from LinkedIn. Tap **'Continue'** on LinkedIn, retype generated token, tap **'Verify'**.
Open **LinkedIn**, then tap the avatar on the top left corner. Next click **'Settings'**.
Click **'Sign in & security'**. Then select the **'Two-step verification'**. Click **'Set up'**.
You may be asked to verify your account by entering a 6-digit code sent to your email.

Choose the **'Authentication app'** and click **'Continue'**.
You may be asked to enter a password for security reasons. Enter your password and click **'Continue'**.
Copy secret key and use **'Add manually'** feature below to add LinkedIn to your 2FAS app. Tap **'Continue'** on LinkedIn, retype generated token, tap **'Verify'**.
